name: @praisetechzw/autopilot
description: An intelligent CLI tool that automatically commits and pushes your code so you can focus on building.
author: Praise Masunga (PraiseTechzw)

scripts.release:patch: npm test && echo "⚠️  Ensure CHANGELOG.md is updated" && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && echo "⚠️  Ensure CHANGELOG.md is updated" && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm test && echo "⚠️  Ensure CHANGELOG.md is updated" && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
